CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959, pg. 7, reads: "Annual Affair Thoroughly Enjoyed by Youngsters - Courier Newsboys Play, Eat, Win Prizes at Picnic -Committee At Work?"
TitMainTitle: Crowd of boys and girls with men, including one standing on left wearing plaid short sleeved shirt, holding megaphone speaker at waist, gathered on lawn in South Park during Pittsburgh Courier Newsboy Picnic
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Boys--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Adolescents--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Parks--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trees--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Lawns--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
